channel.title: World Soccer Wrap(c)
channel.description: Welcome to WORLD SOCCER WRAP! A weekly soccer show. The hosts Ray Ray and Simon Allen cover the world’s greatest game, wrapped in a warm blanket of banter. They go over The English Premiere League, MLS, Serie-A, LaLiga, Ligue 1, Bundesliga and much much more!
channel.itunes:subtitle: Welcome to WORLD SOCCER WRAP! A weekly soccer show. The hosts Ray Ray and Simon Allen cover the world’s greatest game, wrapped in a warm blanket of banter. They go over The English Premiere League, MLS, Serie-A, LaLiga, Ligue 1, Bundesliga and muc
channel.itunes:summary: Welcome to WORLD SOCCER WRAP! A weekly soccer show. The hosts Ray Ray and Simon Allen cover the world’s greatest game, wrapped in a warm blanket of banter. They go over The English Premiere League, MLS, Serie-A, LaLiga, Ligue 1, Bundesliga and much much more!

item.title: World Soccer Wrap (c) Episode 07032011
item.description:
WORLD SOCCER WRAP (c) 07032011 EPISODE 228

This episode is dedicated to The Immortal Number Two, Andres Escobar. Fresh from his Guest Cohosting spot on World Football Daily, Simon Allen brings you another session of World Soccer Wrap taped live in Los Angeles.The Dalai Lama of Soccer covers San Jose Earthquakes Vs New York RedBull , Portland Timbers Vs Sporting KC and DC United Vs Philly. While RayRay covers the North Western Seaboard, Simon talks Women's World Cup and the French players posing nude and the state of Supporters Groups in the US. Simon dives deep into racism in soccer and answers the question that got him into a bunch of trouble this week. Who is better? Messi? or Ronaldo?. Take a guess which one Simon thinks is better! Haiku is read and Old Milwaukee is mentioned a few times.


If you want pop culture... watch MTV!!!...We are the Soccer Culture!!! Since 2006!!!
Please go to SimonAllenSoccer.com to listen to Simon's new show "Sing When You're Winning"
Please go to iTunes podcasts and leave a review for the show that has always belonged to You!!
Subscribe Subscribe Subscribe.

Send your thoughts to Simon and RayRay at worldsoccerwrap@yahoo.com

Spread the word...

facebook.com/worldsoccerwrap

SimonAllenSoccer.com

item.title: World Soccer Wrap (c) Episode 06262011
item.description:
WORLD SOCCER WRAP (c) 06262011 EPISODE 227

Bring me The Head Of Bob Bradley! and Frank Yallop too!! Sunburnt, Tired and Disappointed Simon Allen brings you the episode of World Soccer Wrap in which he just wants Bob Bradley out of US soccer for good . The USA Vs Mexico match is reviewed and Simon announces who he would replace Coach Bradley with. He covers the LA Galaxy Vs The SJ Earthquakes, The NY RedBull Vs Seattle Sounders, Chicago Vs NY Redbull and reads a few Facebook comments. While RayRay covers The North Western Seaboard, Simon talks Women's World Cup . River Plate is discussed as well the worst soccer player ever to put on the USA Jersey.

If you want pop culture... watch MTV!!!...We are the Soccer Culture!!! Since 2006!!!
Please go to SimonAllenSoccer.com to listen to Simon's new show "Sing When You're Winning"
Please go to iTunes podcasts and leave a review for the show that has always belonged to You!!
Subscribe Subscribe Subscribe.

Send your thoughts to Simon and RayRay at worldsoccerwrap@yahoo.com

Spread the word...

facebook.com/worldsoccerwrap

SimonAllenSoccer.com

item.title: World Soccer Wrap (c) Episode 06192011
item.description:
WORLD SOCCER WRAP (c) 06192011 EPISODE 226

With Episode 225 lost in Cyberspace...The Dalai Lama of Soccer, Simon Allen brings you another episode of World Soccer Wrap. The USA Vs Jamaica match is reviewed and Simon counts down Coach Bradley's time in charge. He covers the LA Galaxy Vs The Colorado Rapids and reveals who he thinks would be the best player to turn around The Houston Dynamo. While RayRay covers The North Western Seaboard, Simon talks WPS with the game of the week Boston Breakers Vs Magic Jack. German Playboy magazine is discussed as well as Jedi Mind tricks in domestic soccer. Oh! Canada!!!

If you want pop culture... watch MTV!!!...We are the Soccer Culture!!! Since 2006!!!
Please go to SimonAllenSoccer.com to listen to Simon's new show "Sing When You're Winning"
Please go to iTunes podcasts and leave a review for the show that has always belonged to You!!
Subscribe Subscribe Subscribe.

Send your thoughts to Simon and RayRay at worldsoccerwrap@yahoo.com

Spread the word...

facebook.com/worldsoccerwrap

item.title: World Soccer Wrap (c) Episode 06052011
item.description:
WORLD SOCCER WRAP (c) 06052011 EPISODE 224

Simon Allen and Ray Ray bring you another episode of World Soccer Wrap. They talk USMN V SPAIN, Coach Bradley's weak of a line up and poseurs who wear national team kits that they are not a part of. They also cover the USNW V MEXICO match while Simon is concerned for the futur eof USNW Soccer. MLS games: LA Galaxy V DC United, Chivas V Portland and San Jose V Houston. WPS game of the week Boston Breakers V Magic Jack wraps up this week's show.

Sorry! No Free Orange Slices!!!
If you want pop culture... watch MTV!!!...We are the Soccer Culture!!! Since 2006!!!
Please go to SimonAllenSoccer.com to listen to Simon's new show "Sing When You're Winning"
Please go to iTunes podcasts and leave a review for the show that has always belonged to You!!
Subscribe Subscribe Subscribe.

Send your thoughts to Simon and RayRay at worldsoccerwrap@yahoo.com

Spread the word...

item.title: World Soccer Wrap (c) Episode 05292011
item.description:
WORLD SOCCER WRAP (c) 05229011 EPISODE 223

Simon Allen and Ray Ray break into Studio One to bring you another episode of World Soccer Wrap. They talk two sides of the Champions League Final. Classy? No!! Good? Yes!! The lads discuss Los Angeles Galaxy and the Epic FAIL that is advertising in MLS, the lameness that has spread from Chivas USA to FC Dallas and the location of the Marsall Tucker Band? Ray Ray reports on Sepp Blatter and the other Gangtsers at FIFA while Simon just wonders what the state of soccer will be in 10 years. Simon may be a guest on another show this week so watch for an announcement on Facebook. Simon Allen for FIFA president!!! Sorry! No Free Orange Slices!!!
If you want pop culture... watch MTV!!!...We are the Soccer Culture!!! Since 2006!!!
Please go to SimonAllenSoccer.com to listen to Simon's new show "Sing When You're Winning"
Please go to iTunes podcasts and leave a review for the show that has always belonged to You!!
Subscribe Subscribe Subscribe.

Send your thoughts to Simon and RayRay at worldsoccerwrap@yahoo.com

Spread the word...

facebook.com/worldsoccerwrap
